<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs=""
>
[Blood Sap](/Equipment.aspx?ID=625)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Drug" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=261" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 120</row>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This potent drug is distilled from a certain tropical vine into a deep-red syrup that, over time, stains the user’s lips and teeth a vivid shade of red.

**Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 3 hours; **Stage 1** [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), +1 item bonus to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks, and [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks (10 minutes); **Stage 2** [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) (1 hour)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Blood Sap
